reliquary:AreaDenial.NAME: Negación de área
DESCRIPTIONS: #yEspinas hace daño a TODOS los enemigos.
reliquary:AreaDenial.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This power augments the behavior of the base game's Thorns power.

reliquary:BattleHymnPlus.NAME: Himno de batalla
DESCRIPTIONS: Al inicio de tu turno, Añade #b
reliquary:BattleHymnPlus.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Battle Hymn power.

reliquary:BlurPlus.NAME: Vision Doble
DESCRIPTIONS: #yBloqueo es duplicado en vez de ser removido al inicio de tu proximo turno.
#yBloqueo es duplicado en vez de ser removido al inicio de tus proximos #b
reliquary:BlurPlus.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Blur power.

reliquary:ChainReaction.NAME: Reacción en Cadena
DESCRIPTIONS: Al final de tu turno, gana #b
reliquary:ChainReaction.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: Combust is an existing power in the base game.

reliquary:DeathWarrant.NAME: Orden de ejecución
DESCRIPTIONS: Tu siguiente #yAtaque contra este enemigo este turno hace #b

reliquary:DoubleWindsor.NAME: Doble Windsor
DESCRIPTIONS: #yEstrangular se activa 2 veces con #yHabilidades este turno.

reliquary:FocusDown.NAME: Enfoque hacia abajo
DESCRIPTIONS: Al final de este turno, pierde #b

reliquary:HandSize.NAME: Aumentar el tamaño de la mano
DESCRIPTIONS: Reducir el tamaño de la mano
El tamaño maximo de tu mano es aumentado en #b
El tamaño maximo de tu mano es reducido en #b

reliquary:HelloPlus.NAME: Fizzbuzz
DESCRIPTIONS: Al inicio de tu turno, añade #b
carta poco comun aleatoria a tu mano.
cartas poco comunes aleatorias a tu mano.
reliquary:HelloPlus.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Hello power.

NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an alternate version of the Watcher's Blasphemy debuff.
Instead of killing you at the end of the current turn (1 turn), it kills you in N turns.
It takes the name ('Blasphemer,' in English) from the existing debuff, so you don't need to translate that.

DESCRIPTIONS: Reduce TODO el daño tomado y la perdida de PV a #b1 este turno.
Reduce TODO el daño tomado y la perdida de PV a #b1 por los siguientes #b
reliquary:IntangibleTurns.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This a turn-based version of the base game's Intangible power..

reliquary:InvincibleTurns.NAME: Invencible
DESCRIPTIONS: No puede ser dañado este turno
No puede ser dañado los proximos #b

reliquary:LesserDuplication.NAME: Duplicacion Menor
DESCRIPTIONS: Tu proxima carta de coste 0 o 1 es jugada 2 veces este turno.
cartas de coste 0 o 1 son jugadas 2 veces este turno.
reliquary:LesserDuplication.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an weaker version of the base game's Duplication power.

reliquary:MrofOhce.NAME: Amrof Oce
DESCRIPTIONS: La ultima carta que juegues cada turno es jugada 2 veces.
cartas que juegas cada turno son jugadas 2 veces.
reliquary:MrofOhce.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an alternate version of the base game's Echo Form power. 'Mrof Ohce' is Echo Form backwards.

reliquary:QuantumAI.NAME: IA Quantum
DESCRIPTIONS: Al inicio del turno, añade #b1 de #b2 cartas aleatorias de #yPoder a tu mano.
Al inicio del turno, añade #b1 de #b2 cartas aleatorias de #yPoder a tu mano. 2 veces.
Al inicio del turno, añade #b1 de #b2 cartas aleatorias de #yPoder a tu mano #b
reliquary:QuantumAI.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Study power.

reliquary:Rattled.NAME: Agitado
DESCRIPTIONS: Recibes el doble de daño del siguient ataque no bloqueado.
Recibes el doble de daño de los siguientes #b
reliquary:Rattled.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: A pun on rattlesnakes and being 'rattled,' i.e. unnerved or disarmed.

reliquary:ReboundPlus.NAME: Resonar
DESCRIPTIONS: La proxima carta que juegues este turno es colocada en tu mano.
cartas que juegues este turno son colocadas en tu mano.
reliquary:ReboundPlus.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Rebound power.

reliquary:ReduceColorlessCost.NAME: Pálido
DESCRIPTIONS: La proxima carta Incolora que juegues cuesta #b1 menos.
cartas Incoloras que juegues cuestan #b1 menos.

reliquary:StormPlus.NAME: Supertormenta
reliquary:StormPlus.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Storm power.

reliquary:StudyPlus.NAME: Atiborrar
reliquary:StudyPlus.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This is an improved version of the base game's Study power.

reliquary:Taunt.NAME: Provocar
DESCRIPTIONS: Los otros enemigos no pueden ser atacados hasta que este muera.

reliquary:ThermalPaste.NAME: Pasta Térmica
DESCRIPTIONS: #yDisipadores robará cartas de #yPoder cuando sea posible.
reliquary:ThermalPaste.NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: This power augments the behavior of the Defect's Heatsinks power.

reliquary:Triumph.NAME: Triunfo
DESCRIPTIONS: El multiplicador de daño de #yDivinidad es aumentado en #b

reliquary:Vim.NAME: Vigorizado
NOTE_FOR_TRANSLATORS: 'Envimmed' isn't a real word, it's an adjective I made up to mean 'infused with vim,' as 'invigorated' means 'infused with vigor.'
Feel free to use anything that means invigorated, or make one up...?
This uses the description strings from the Berserk power.
